thread.title: Ridley Scott Produced This Crazy YouTube Series About Earth Losing Its Gravity
thread.title_full: Ridley Scott Produced This Crazy YouTube Series About Earth Losing Its Gravity | Maxim

author: Mikelle Street
title: Ridley Scott Produced This Crazy YouTube Series About Earth Losing Its Gravity
text:
After winning the YouTube Your Film Festival in 2012 , David Victori has been working on his latest project: ZERO . With Sir Ridley Scott ( Blade Runner, The Martian , American Gangster ) and Michael Fassbender ( Steve Jobs , X-Men , 300 ) as executive producers, the writer/director explores the idea of life on Earth after gravity.
The series centers around a father and son played by Ryan Eggold ( The Blacklist , Sons of Liberty , Entourage ) and Felix Avitia ( Glee , Bones ) who find themselves without gravity in the middle of their morning routine. The project's site indicates that the series will follow Avitia as he searches through the city for his father while responding to the recent death of his mother.
The next episode is set to go live November 5.
